item.title: NREGA Analysis
item.description: Workdays experience caste Worked experience caste Deposits experience caste Ratio experience caste Workdays total days worked under NREGS – Coded as: log(Workdays + 1) ## # A tibble: 2 x 2 ## dyn_cum `mean(workdays)` ## <int> <dbl> ## 1 0 7.81 ## 2 1 7.85 experience ## # A tibble: 5 x 2 ## fam_exp_cum_cat `mean(workdays)` ## <fct> <dbl> ## 1 [0,1) 7.

item.title: MPLADS Analyis
item.description: MPLADS Famil v/s Non-family Days Number of Projects Expenditure Experience categories Type of work v/s projects Type of work v/s cost MPLADS Famil v/s Non-family Table 1: MPLADS prjects and spending Type of constiuency Average number of contracts Avergae expenditure per project Non-family 321 348678 Family 433 318665 The difference in the mean of both project count and the expenditure is statistically significant.

item.title: ADR Analysis
item.description: ADR Analysis Assets Family v/s non-family Experience v/s assets Asset growth over time Assets v/s caste Crime Political expereince Perfromance ADR Analysis Assets Family v/s non-family Experience v/s assets exp v/s caste v/s assets Asset growth over time GE Total assets Asset growth Movable assets Immovable assets AE Total assets Asset Growth Total Assets Movable assets Immovable assets Assets v/s caste Crime Political expereince Family caste v/s crime % mutate(crime_ser_d = if_else(serious_crime == 0,0,1)) -- % group_by(dyn_cum,fam_exp_cum_cat,crime_ser_d) %% summarise(count = n()) %% group_by(dyn_cum,fam_exp_cum_cat) %% mutate(sum= sum(count)) %% ungroup() %% mutate(prop= count/sum) %% -- % mutate(crime_non_ser_d = if_else(non_serious_crime == 0,0,1)) -- % group_by(dyn_cum,fam_exp_cum_cat,crime_non_ser_d) %% summarise(count = n()) %% group_by(dyn_cum,fam_exp_cum_cat) %% mutate(sum= sum(count)) %% ungroup() %% mutate(prop= count/sum) %% -- Perfromance All elections Table 1: Average performance of MPs in the Parliament (trimmed mean) Entity Debates partcipated Proprtion of the sessions attended Questions asked Non-family 35.

item.title: Master file Analyis
item.description: Political Families Analysis goals Summary statistics Elections covered Basic eda Assembly Elections General Elections local body elections Analyis at different levels All elections Members in the other levels and the probabilty Land distribution Industries: Education Industries : Others caste Experience AE - GE Land distribution Industries: Education Industries : Others Caste Experience Local bodies Mid level Low level PRI’s ULB’s Fig 1 Political Families This data set knits the families of contestants in the elections held in Uttar Pradesh.
